title: What kind of Instagram page should I make? - Quora

response.answer_text: I will help you here to completely know about what kind of pages grow fast on Instagram and they earned a good amount of money through sponsors lifestyle blogging lifestyle bloggers Instagramer are known as influencers. because they daily upload content about lifestyle makeup tutorials, fashion clothes, so the cloth brands, makeup brands approach them. for their product promotion to their audience. and there are high chances to grow a lifestyle blogging page on Instagram. mems pages everyone know that mostly we use Instagram to see memes pages post for entertainment. and within-day consistent upload of content. for meme page can grow fast. just to you need to create a content that others can find funny. online selling page after coronavirus Instagram it self supported Instagram seller for sale online through Instagram store option. where user can directly land on sale page through the Instagram post. and if you have some product you want to sale online Instagram is the best option for you if you find the answer helpful click on upvote button. .

One where you can create content about something that you know about. It may be a hobby or about your work. If you create an account already knowing what it will be about, then it will be easier for you to start creating content for it.
